user_activity.description: User-related events such as login, logout, registration, profile updates

space_activity.description: Space-related events such as creation, updates, deletion, sharing

social_media.description: Social media integration-related events like sharing, posting, connections

templator.description: Template management events such as uploads, extractions, and deletions

templator_activity.description: General templator app activity (duplicate of templator for backward compatibility)
